mud_networking
Class ClientStorage

java.lang.Object
  mud_networking.ClientStorage
public class ClientStorage
extends java.lang.Object

This is a class responsible for storing connected players for the means of a callback RMI communication.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Krzysztof Kondrak
